statements: SELECT * FROM SecuritySchedule;
SELECT personnel_id, shift_start FROM SecuritySchedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT shift_end, personnel_id FROM SecuritySchedule WHERE personnel_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SecuritySchedule ORDER BY shift_start DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SecuritySchedule WHERE shift_start > NOW();
SELECT * FROM SecuritySchedule WHERE personnel_id = 1 ORDER BY shift_start DESC;
SELECT id, personnel_id, shift_start FROM SecuritySchedule WHERE shift_end > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shift_end ASC;
SELECT personnel_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM SecuritySchedule GROUP BY personnel_id HAVING total_shifts > 10;
SELECT personnel_id, MAX(shift_end) AS last_shift_end FROM SecuritySchedule GROUP BY personnel_id ORDER BY last_shift_end DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT personnel_id FROM SecuritySchedule WHERE shift_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM security_personnel;
SELECT name, rank FROM security_personnel WHERE rank = 'Officer';
SELECT id, name, badge_number FROM security_personnel WHERE badge_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM shift_schedule WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
SELECT shift_type, start_time, end_time FROM shift_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_personnel WHERE rank='Captain';
SELECT name, badge_number FROM security_personnel ORDER BY badge_number DESC;
SELECT id, name, start_time FROM security_personnel JOIN shift_schedule ON security_personnel.id = shift_schedule.personnel_id WHERE shift_type='Day Shift';
SELECT * FROM shift_schedule WHERE personnel_id IN (SELECT id FROM security_personnel WHERE rank='Lieutenant');
SELECT name, badge_number, rank FROM security_personnel WHERE badge_number BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY rank ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_personnel;
SELECT name, badge_number FROM security_personnel;
SELECT position, name FROM security_personnel ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE shift_date = '2022-09-30';
SELECT security_personnel_id, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM schedules WHERE shift_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT name, badge_number FROM security_personnel WHERE position = 'Guard'
SELECT * FROM security_personnel ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, shift_date, shift_start_time FROM security_personnel JOIN schedules ON security_personnel.id = schedules.security_personnel_id
SELECT MAX(badge_number) AS highest_badge_number, MIN(badge_number) AS lowest_badge_number FROM security_personnel
SELECT security_personnel.name, schedules.shift_start_time, shift_confirmation FROM security_personnel JOIN shift_assignments ON security_personnel.id = shift_assignments.security_personnel_id
SELECT * FROM security_personnel
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role FROM security_personnel WHERE personnel_id = 1
SELECT * FROM shift_assignments ORDER BY shift_date DESC
SELECT personnel_id, shift_date, shift_time FROM shift_assignments WHERE personnel_id = 2
SELECT schedule_id, shift_type, shift_duration FROM shifts
SELECT * FROM security_personnel WHERE personnel_role='Guard';
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role FROM security_personnel ORDER BY personnel_name DESC;
SELECT s.shift_type, sh.shift_time FROM shifts s INNER JOIN shift_assignments sh ON s.shift_id = sh.shift_id WHERE sh.shift_date='2022-10-15';

SELECT sp.personnel_name, s.shift_type FROM security_personnel sp INNER JOIN shift_assignments sh ON sp.personnel_id = sh.personnel_id INNER JOIN shifts s ON sh.shift_id = s.shift_id WHERE sp.personnel_role='Supervisor';
SELECT * FROM security_personnel WHERE personnel_id IN (SELECT personnel_id FROM shift_assignments WHERE shift_date='2022-10-15');
SELECT * FROM SecurityPersonnel;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role FROM SecurityPersonnel ORDER BY personnel_role DESC;
SELECT shift_date, shift_type FROM Shifts WHERE shift_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shift_date ASC;
SELECT personnel_name, hourly_rate FROM SecurityPersonnel WHERE hourly_rate > 15;

SELECT personnel_name, location_name FROM SecurityPersonnel INNER JOIN ShiftAssignments ON SecurityPersonnel.personnel_id = ShiftAssignments.personnel_id INNER JOIN ShiftLocations ON ShiftAssignments.shift_id = ShiftLocations.shift_id INNER JOIN Locations ON ShiftLocations.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT personnel_id, personnel_name, personnel_role, hourly_rate FROM SecurityPersonnel;
SELECT * FROM Shifts WHERE shift_type = 'Night Shift';

SELECT sp.personnel_name, s.shift_date, l.location_name FROM SecurityPersonnel sp JOIN ShiftAssignments sa ON sp.personnel_id = sa.personnel_id JOIN Shifts s ON sa.shift_id = s.shift_id JOIN ShiftLocations sl ON s.shift_id = sl.shift_id JOIN Locations l ON sl.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT personnel_name, SUM(hourly_rate) AS total_pay FROM SecurityPersonnel GROUP BY personnel_name;

SELECT sp.personnel_name, SUM(hourly_rate) AS total_pay FROM SecurityPersonnel sp JOIN ShiftAssignments sa ON sp.personnel_id = sa.personnel_id JOIN Shifts s ON sa.shift_id = s.shift_id GROUP BY personnel_name;
